fullText: The Play That Goes Wrong is a theatrical machine designed to generate laughs through spectacular failure, and it works with clockwork precision.
dtliExcerpt: The Play That Goes Wrong is a theatrical machine designed to generate laughs through spectacular failure, and it works with clockwork precision.
bwwExcerpt: If you want to have a good time at this show, chances are good that you will; there are many funny sequences, and I laughed a lot. But you may find it rather exhausting. With almost no baseline reality from which to depart, the show is all payoffs and no setups; it's like a stand-up routine consisti...
